snippet: Works by Marc Bamuthi Joseph and Kyle Abraham, blending dance and poetry, were performed as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors on Thursday.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance works by Marc Bamuthi Joseph and Kyle Abraham performed at Damrosch Park as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival.
lead_paragraph: Works by Marc Bamuthi Joseph and Kyle Abraham, blending dance and poetry, were performed as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Words Fortified With Movement, and the Narratives They Push Ahead
